title: 230: Are We Scared of Hell? | Ear Biscuits Ep. 230
description:
From what they think about Hell to their thoughts on miracles, lsten to R&L dive deeper into details of their current beliefs in this episode of Ear Biscuits!

(8:47) - what if we're wrong
(12:55) - do we believe in Hell?
(37:16) - miracles and supernatural experiences
(43:42) - R's miracles
(53:47) - R's experience with the supernatural
(57:14) - L's experience with miracles
(1:01:24) - our thoughts on ghosts
(1:02:18) -R's perspective behind leaving L on the side of the road
(1:04:04) - the wax paper dogz pact
(1:09:50) - young R's vice
(1:11:17) - our relationship with God during the lost years
(1:20:59) - R's rec
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
